channel.title: Combat update
channel.description:
i know this might be a bit experienced to explain it in a simple reply... But i've been looking for a tut for 2 days now. If any of you can link me to one or if you can explain it that would be great (y)
Basically players combat dont update... the max combat is 138 and that's because summoning works. but i could get 99 attack in game and still be combat 3, until i log out. why's this? :s
when other players look at me it says like combat 50 but when i look at me it says cb 3... until i log out and back in then it says the actual combat? :(

item.title: Combat update
item.dc:creator: @V113 V1
